author: Seren Morris
title: Alabama, Missouri, South Carolina and Utah Have No Statewide Stay-at-Home Orders As Their Coronavirus Cases Reach 1,000
description: The majority of U.S. states have now implemented stay-at-home-orders, but Alabama, Missouri, South Carolina and Utah have yet to do so.
content:
On Wednesday, President Donald Trump said he has no plans to issue a national stay-at-home order as he believes that the virus affects each state differently and so the decision should be left to governors.
However, Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the Nationa… [+5410 chars]
